notes:
This dataset includes an [OpenStreetMap](http://www.openstreetmap.org) extracts for roads in Haiti. Also see the [Haiti OpenStreetMap extract, Buildings](https://data.hdx.rwlabs.org/dataset/haiti-openstreetmap-extract-buildings) and [Haiti OpenStreetMap extract, POIs](https://data.hdx.rwlabs.org/dataset/haiti-openstreetmap-extract-pois) datasets on HDX.

The shapefiles include all building features in the OpenStreetMap database for Haiti, including the following tags:

- [highway=*](http://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Key:highway)
- [name=*](http://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Key:name)
- [surface=*](http://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Key:surface)
- [smoothness=*](http://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Key:smoothness)
- [oneway=*](http://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Key:oneway)
- [bridge=*](http://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Key:bridge)

See the [Humanitarian OpenStreetMap Team](http://hotosm.org/) website for more information on the response.
